en.name: parables
en.title: Parables
en.subtitle: All 49 parables of Jesus
en.description: Jesus used parables to give understanding to those who were seeking him. He revealed the truth to those who were willing to listen and think carefully about what he was saying. But for those who had hardened their hearts against him, the truth remained hidden.

en.name: prayers
en.title: Prayers
en.subtitle: All the prayers mentioned in the Bible,.
en.description: Like Solomon's prayer for the new temple 'Now, O my God, let your eyes be open and your ears attentive to the prayer made in this place.'

en.name: dictionary
en.title: Bible dictionary
en.subtitle: Learn how to read the bible in english.
en.description: if you are not a native English speaker, this is a list of the most common English words you need to know before reading the Bible in English.

en.name: angels
en.title: Angels
en.subtitle: All the mentioned angels in the bible
en.description: if you are not a native English speaker, this is a list of the most common English words you need to know before reading the Bible in English.

ar.description: قائمة بجميع أمثال يسوع الـ 49، كما تظهر في الأناجيل الأربعة للعهد الجديد
